I.name: Noxious Slipstream
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever '''Singed''' moves near a {{tip|champion}}, he gains {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent passes and stacks up to 25 times.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Whenever Singed moves near a champion, he gains 20% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent passes and stacks up to 25 times.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

Q.name: Poison Trail
description: {{sbc|Toggle:}} '''Singed''' continually creates a toxic cloud in his wake that lingers for {{fd|3.25}} seconds. The cloud inflicts {{tip|poison}} to enemies within, and resets the duration every {{fd|0.5}} seconds while they remain.
{{sbc|{{tip|poison|nolink=true}}:}} The target takes {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over 2 seconds. Subsequent inflictions refresh the duration.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Toggle: Singed continually creates a toxic cloud in his wake that lingers for 3.25 seconds. The cloud inflicts poison to enemies within, and resets the duration every 0.5 seconds while they remain.
poison: The target takes magic damage every 0.25 seconds over 2 seconds. Subsequent inflictions refresh the duration.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage per Tick|{{ap|5 to 15}} {{as|(+ {{fd|11.25}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|5*8 to 15*8}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
Q.notes:
*Toggle abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The clouds check for enemy targets in the area immediately upon being spawned. After a {{fd|0.25}}-{{fd|0.5}} second delay, they check every {{fd|0.25}} seconds again until they fade.
** Targets already with the DoT can have the debuff refreshed only every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
** Due to the inconsistent offset between the first and future ticks is it possible for a static target to miss out on one refresh of the debuff, equal to 3 ticks of damage.
* If '''Singed''' has moved less than 90 units since spawning the last poison cloud, it will spawn 35 units in front of him. They also only spawn every 1 second in this case. 
** When '''Singed''' is moving faster than that, the poison clouds spawn more frequently and on top of himself.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage per Tick: (+ 11.25% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 90% AP)

W.name: Mega Adhesive
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' spills a potent adhesive that lands at the target location over {{tt|{{rutngt|0.25}} to {{rutngt|0.5}}|See notes}}, creating a field for 3 seconds that {{tip|ground|grounds}} enemies within and {{tip|slows}} them by 60%.
W.descriptionHtml: Active: Singed spills a potent adhesive that lands at the target location over 0.264 to 0.528, creating a field for 3 seconds that grounds enemies within and slows them by 60%.

E.name: Fling
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' {{tip|airborne|flings}} the target enemy 550 units over himself, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, capped against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
If the target lands on ''{{ai|Mega Adhesive|Singed}}'', they are {{tip|root|rooted}} for a duration.
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Singed flings the target enemy 550 units over himself, dealing magic damage, capped against minions and monsters.
If the target lands on Singed's Mega Adhesive, they are rooted for a duration.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|50 to 90}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6 to 8}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Maximum Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|50+300 to 90+300}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
E.notes:
* ''Fling'' can throw enemies over walls (circumstances permitting).
* {{tip|Slow-immune}} enemies will not be {{tip|root|rooted}} when ''flung'' into {{ai|Mega Adhesive|Singed}}.
* ''Fling'' is special cased to not {{tip|airborne|fling}} {{ci|Warwick}} while '''Singed''' is {{tip|suppression|suppressed}} by {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} after the cast time.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health) (+ 60% AP)
  • Maximum Non-Champion Damage: (+ 60% AP)

st_slices: (+ % of target's maximum health) (+ 60% AP)

R.name: Insanity Potion
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' empowers himself for 25 seconds with {{sti|ap|{{as|'''bonus''' ability power}}}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}}, {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' health regeneration}}}}, and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' mana regeneration}}}}.
During this time, ''{{ai|Poison Trail|Singed}}'' additionally applies 25% {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 1 second, and refreshes every {{fd|0.25}} seconds while the {{tip|poison}} persists.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Singed empowers himself for 25 seconds with bonus ability power, bonus armor, bonus magic resistance, bonus movement speed, bonus health regeneration, and bonus mana regeneration.
During this time, Singed's Poison Trail additionally applies 25% Grievous Wounds for 1 second, and refreshes every 0.25 seconds while the poison persists.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Stats|{{ap|30 to 90}}}}
{{st|Regeneration per Second|{{ap|30/5 to 90/5}}|Total Regeneration|{{ap|30*5 to 90*5}}}}
